channel.title: ChronicScape [Allstar Remake]
channel.description:
[center][b]~Chronic-Scape~[/b][/center]
Now before you read the rest of the thread please be respectful. This is an allstar Base, if you hate allstar and plan to rant my topic, please leave. If you want to quote everything i say and Flame at me for posting an allstar in development, please leave. I know all of you are entitled to your opinion, and that's fine but have common respect.
[u]Most Common Question[/u] Why don't you code delta or pi? My specialty is Coding Allstar
When this server is fully complete and when im satisfied what me and my developers have done i will Add us to be the first Allstar Server to Sponser list with finding us a Good VPS host.
[b]Updates:[/b] New Training interface Quest Tab commands added! New ::skills & shop Area. ADDED DICING! & "::dicing" area Removed alot of un-needed codes in client.java (less lag and more stable.) Added, full anti null (flood detection) Removed High alch, Tele grab. Removed All dupes, and Item Trade Scam (remove all in second window) Re-arranged shops Re-arranged Prices fixed blood rune lag Added Ticket Shop! Exchange 2B for tickets 1 Click pickup Fixed No Beard glitch (no mouth) Randomized Gaining Cash from mining and Crafting! Added a few commands
[b]Future Updates:[/b] Adding a custom quest Taking out gs mini adding full Mining, woodcutting, and fletching. Creating a new Mini game Making Gambling system from scratch
[b]What im Currently working on:[/b] Woodcutting [color=green]Adding stumps when tree is cut.[/color] -Adding Correct timers [color=green]Global Object Handler So when the tree is cut it effects more than 1 person[/color] -[color=green]Replace Cash with actual logs[/color] -Make a formula as you lvl up
[b]Developers[/b] -Me -mrsilabsoft -JokesOnYou
^^More Stuff will be added in time. Now please bare with me this isn't much i know. But i Plan to finish this development and i will Update this Weekly if not daily.
[b]Media:[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G4bYwSHF3_E

item.title: ChronicScape [Allstar Remake]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

That’s one thing we need to work on. Crafting. I’m tired of seeing allstar servers that all you have to do is click the drawer for Xp and money. We will need to take the money out, and make it give you Gems. Use a chisel or whatever, and boom, then you can make it give you money. Anyways, Get back to me man.

Read full topic

item.title: ChronicScape [Allstar Remake]
item.dc:creator: @weeddamn weeddamn
item.description:
@weeddamn wrote:

[center]~Chronic-Scape~[/center]

Now before you read the rest of the thread please be respectful. This is an allstar Base, if you hate allstar and plan to rant my topic, please leave. If you want to quote everything i say and Flame at me for posting an allstar in development, please leave. I know all of you are entitled to your opinion, and that’s fine but have common respect.

Most Common Question
Why don’t you code delta or pi?
My specialty is Coding Allstar

When this server is fully complete and when im satisfied what me and my developers have done i will Add us to be the first Allstar Server to Sponser list with finding us a Good VPS host.

Updates:
New Training interface
Quest Tab commands added!
New ::skills & shop Area.
ADDED DICING! & “::dicing” area
Removed alot of un-needed codes in client.java (less lag and more stable.)
Added, full anti null (flood detection)
Removed High alch, Tele grab.
Removed All dupes, and Item Trade Scam (remove all in second window)
Re-arranged shops
Re-arranged Prices
fixed blood rune lag
Added Ticket Shop! Exchange 2B for tickets
1 Click pickup
Fixed No Beard glitch (no mouth)
Randomized Gaining Cash from mining and Crafting!
Added a few commands

Future Updates:
Adding a custom quest
Taking out gs mini
adding full Mining, woodcutting, and fletching.
Creating a new Mini game
Making Gambling system from scratch

What im Currently working on:
Woodcutting
[color=green]Adding stumps when tree is cut.[/color]
-Adding Correct timers
[color=green]Global Object Handler So when the tree is cut it effects more than 1 person[/color]
-[color=green]Replace Cash with actual logs[/color]
-Make a formula as you lvl up

Developers
-Me
-mrsilabsoft
-JokesOnYou

^^More Stuff will be added in time.
Now please bare with me this isn’t much i know. But i Plan to finish this development and i will Update this Weekly if not daily.
